content.text: By using our SPA CHLOR ULTRA or SPA BROMA sanitizing products regularly, you prevent the proliferation of bacteria, germs, viruses, moss and any living microorganisms in general. For an effective treatment, itâ€™s important to respect basic principles such as water filtration and circulation, as well as the regular addition of a sanitizer according to the recommended dosages on the instructions of the product you are using.
